item.description:
Hello everyone - our very own Kim K creates some really fabulous artwork (some of which can be seen at www.kimsconcretedreams.com). She has graciously decided to open up her home/studio in Middletown so that we can all enjoy it from 1pm-5pm (or so?.)

**UPDATE** At 1pm on Friday, I emailed everyone who said 'maybe' or 'yes' with Kim's address. If you RSVP after this time, please email me to ensure that I send you the address. Thanks! dev

From Kim: "After several requests and a bit of pondering, I am staying home on a Sunday in June to open my studio for the curious and brave to come and see.

In addition, for all the garden junkies, my neighbors on either side of me will open their gardens for touring. One neighbor, (my mom) Helen, has a very eclectic and ever expanding garden with many fascinating plantings. The other neighbor, Ellie, has a garden with many earth friendly features and native plantings. Ellie has also developed a very interesting spiral garden to walk with the story of the universe. ??and I??.will have beer and a grill in my front yard "kinda sort of" outdoor gallery of concrete art?.

All are welcome and encouraged to come with or without fathers, family and friends?.and perhaps, but not necessary, something to add to the festivities?

See you there! Kim"

The address will be sent within a few days of the event to those who RSVP 'yes' or 'maybe'.
item.name: Kim's Concrete Dreams Open Studio? and a bit of a party
